New Records: Corey Seager’s two-run homer was the hardest-hit Fall Classic homer in the Statcast era, dating back to 2015.
Key Match Events: Corey Seager launched a two-run homer into the right-field seats as part of a three-run third.
Adolis García cut down Christian Walker at the plate with a stellar throw from right field.
Marcus Semien started a crucial double play, sliding on his knees to field a hot smash from Ketel Marte before flipping to first.
Pre-Game Insights: Texas Rangers improved to 9-0 on the road this postseason.
Manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance.
Post-Match Reflections: The Texas Rangers took a 2-1 lead in the best-of-seven series.
The victory was highlighted as a pivotal moment in their playoff push.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game saw no errors over the first two games of the series.
The Rangers produced more defensive highlights that helped them take control of Game 3.
